p: Cities with large increases for the hottest month of the year generally had comparably large increases for the coldest month. However, some more northerly cities with colder winter climates (Montreal, Moscow, Nuuk, Omsk, and Saint Petersburg) had relatively larger increases for the coldest month by comparison with the hottest month of the year, while southern European cities, including Madrid and Katerini, had relatively large increases in T mean for the hottest month compared with the increases for the coldest month.
